About Me

Get to know me!

BIO

I am a Graphic Designer from the San Francisco bay area. I started with a passion for Photography which led to a scholarship to the Academy of Art School in San Francisco. In order to transistion towards digital art, I recieved my Bachelor of Fine arts degree at Silicon Valley College in Fremont, CA. That was my introduction to Photoshop, Illustrator, as well as rudimentary web design. I expanded my knowledge of design software working at a flatbed scanner company, which led me to freelance design. I'm self-taught in web development and certified in HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript through Cambridge Certification Authority.

I love clean lines, the beauty of function and the exhileration of the experience. I strive to create positive experiences that have a lasting impact. Design is fascinating with the possibilites for interaction and the ability to convey complex ideas with shapes, colors and well-chosen words. I enjoy the process of creating. It is the ability to fulfill a certain need that truly drives me. To solve a complex problem. It is this vision that leads me to learn more technologies, learn more skills and learn more about the world.
